testcase.name: TC01_Verification of company services tab under Company Profile page
testcase.system-out: Given User launch application in chrome browser.............................passed When User click on login button from top navigation menu then should land on login page.passed When User enters Email Address and password.................................passed And click on the checkbox given for bot I am not robot......................passed Then click on the Login button..............................................passed Then after verification of email user should be redirect on phone authentication code.passed Then click on the company setting arrow placed at the left hand side navigation.passed Then click on company profile link from left hand side navigation menu under company settings page.passed Then click on the services tab..............................................passed Then enter the details for the Brief Description of Business................passed Then enter the details for the Primary NAICs Codes..........................passed Then enter the details for the Secondary NAICs Codes........................passed
